text: James Edward “Jimmy” Franco (born April 19, 1978) is an American actor, producer, screenwriter and director. His movie roles included 127 Hours, Rise of the Planet of the Apes, Your Highness, Spider-Man, Spider-Man 2, Spider-Man 3 (alongside Tobey Maguire), Oz the Great and Powerful, This Is the End, The Interview, The Little Prince, Sausage Party, Why Him? and The Disaster Artist. He won a Golden Globe Award in 2001. Franco was born in Palo Alto, California. He studied at the Palo Alto High School and at University of California, Los Angeles. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American painters Category:American poets Category:American activists Category:Actors from Santa Clara County, California Category:Musicians from California Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:People from Palo Alto, California Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Educators from California
title: James Franco
